item.title: Amusing Ourselves To Death - Public Discourse In The Age Of Show Business
item.description: Amusing Ourselves to Death is a book about the corrosive effects of television on our politics and public discourse. Now, with television joined by more sophisticated electronic media–from the Internet to cell phones to DVDs– it’s more relevant than ever.
